// src/components/ModernHeader.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Search, ShoppingCart, User, Bell, Globe, ChevronDown, Phone, Shield, Truck, RefreshCw, Clock, TrendingUp, BarChart, CreditCard, Menu, X } from 'lucide-react'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; const ModernHeader = ({ onCartClick, onLoginClick, user, onLogout }) => { const { getCartCount } = useCart(); const cartCount = getCartCount(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [isUserMenuOpen, setIsUserMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [marketStats, setMarketStats] = useState({ cars: '+2.1%', electronics: '+1.5%', evDemand: '+20%', accuracy: '98.7%' }); useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setMarketStats(prev => ({ ...prev, cars: `+${(2.1 + Math.random() * 0.3 - 0.15).toFixed(1)}%`, electronics: `+${(1.5 + Math.random() * 0.2 - 0.1).toFixed(1)}%`, })); }, 30000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (searchQuery.trim()) { navigate(`/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(searchQuery.trim())}`); setSearchQuery(''); } }; const userMenuItems = [ { label: 'My Profile', path: '/profile', icon: }, { label: 'Orders', path: '/orders', icon: }, { label: 'Payment Methods', path: '/payment-methods', icon: , badge: 'NEW' }, { label: 'Market Dashboard', path: '/market-dashboard', icon: , badge: 'AI' }, { label: 'Notifications', path: '/notifications', icon: }, { label: 'Settings', path: '/settings', icon: }, { type: 'divider' }, { label: 'Logout', action: onLogout, icon: }, ]; return ( <> {/* Top Announcement Bar */}
{/* Market Indicators */}
Live Market Data
{marketStats.cars} Car Index
{marketStats.electronics} Electronics
{marketStats.evDemand} EV Demand
{/* Trust Indicators */}
Free UK Delivery
Secure Payment
30-Day Returns
{/* Main Header */}
{/* Logo & Mobile Menu */}
{/* Mobile Menu Button */} {/* Logo */}
UD

UniDigital

Premium Marketplace

{/* Desktop Search Bar */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search 50,000+ cars, electronics & accessories..." className="w-full pl-12 pr-32 py-3 bg-gray-100 border-0 rounded-full focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:bg-white transition-all" />
{/* User Actions */}
{/* Global Payments */} Global Payments {/* Notifications */} {/* Cart */} {/* User Account */} {user ? (
{/* User Dropdown */} {isUserMenuOpen && ( <>
setIsUserMenuOpen(false)} />
{/* User Info */}
{user.name?.charAt(0) || user.email?.charAt(0) || 'U'}
{user.name || 'User Account'}
{user.email}
{/* Menu Items */}
{userMenuItems.map((item, index) => ( item.type === 'divider' ? (
) : ( { if (item.action) item.action(); setIsUserMenuOpen(false); }} >
{item.icon} {item.label}
{item.badge && ( {item.badge} )} ) ))}
)}
) : ( )}
{/* Mobile Search */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search products..." className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-2.5 bg-gray-100 border-0 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:bg-white" />
{/* Mobile Menu */} {isMobileMenuOpen && (
setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Home setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > All Products setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Global Payments LIVE setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Market Analysis AI setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Electronics setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Auto Parts
{/* Mobile Market Stats */}
{marketStats.cars}
Car Index
{marketStats.electronics}
Electronics
{marketStats.evDemand}
EV Demand
{marketStats.accuracy}
AI Accuracy
)} {/* Live Status Bar */}
Updated every 5 minutes
AI-Priced Items
); }; export default ModernHeader;
